post.body: I don't need centralized platforms as gab.ai. I can be a facist and make hate speech on ZeroNet or Mastodon. Don't @nofish and @gargron agree with this behavior? But I shouldn't ask them. It is what decentralization is.
Hi, zeronetians! Please, give me some recommendations about coins and tokens to add to my crypto-portfolio. Old mature coins is preferrable than fresh outed-form-ICOs.

comment.body: @霸王寨第一光头: thanks, I already have these. I would glad to hear something interesting and less popular. Even if it is out of the top 100 at coinmarketcap.
